chapters.title: Chapter 42: Before the Stone of Tear
chapters.info: High Lord Tedosian, p. 662—High Lord of Tear, one of those who went into hiding in Haddon Mirk once the battle at Cairhien was over. He is married to Alteima, but their marriage is not a happy one. He emerged as the most prominent beseiger of the Stone of Tear. He has apparently been convinced to support Rand.
